nodes.documentation: @dev The Liquidations contract for a Dealer allows to liquidate undercollateralized positions in a reverse Dutch auction.
nodes.name: Liquidations

nodes.documentation: @dev Disables post, withdraw, borrow and repay. To be called only by shutdown management contracts.
nodes.name: shutdown

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Liquidations: Vault is already in liquidation"

nodes.documentation: @dev Starts a liquidation process for a given collateral and user.

nodes.documentation: @dev Liquidates a position. The caller pays the debt of `from`, and `buyer` receives an amount of collateral.
nodes.name: buy

nodes.documentation: @dev Return price of a collateral unit, in dai, at the present moment, for a given user
nodes.name: price

nodes.documentation:
@dev Divides x between y, rounding up to the closest representable number.
 Assumes x and y are both fixed point with `decimals` digits.
nodes.name: divdrup

devdoc.details: The Liquidations contract for a Dealer allows to liquidate undercollateralized positions in a reverse Dutch auction.

buy(bytes32,address,address,uint256).details: Liquidates a position. The caller pays the debt of `from`, and `buyer` receives an amount of collateral.

grantAccess(address).details: Add user to the authorized users list

liquidate(bytes32,address).details: Starts a liquidation process for a given collateral and user.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

price(bytes32,address).details: Return price of a collateral unit, in dai, at the present moment, for a given user

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revokeAccess(address).details: Remove user to the authorized users list

shutdown().details: Disables post, withdraw, borrow and repay. To be called only by shutdown management contracts.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
